CustomField.formula: IF( Responded_Percent_Correct__c < $CustomMetadata.LFL_Stats_Boundary__mdt.lfl_stats_boundary.Low__c, IMAGE("/resource/red", "red"), IF( Responded_Percent_Correct__c >= $CustomMetadata.LFL_Stats_Boundary__mdt.lfl_stats_boundary.High__c, IMAGE("/resource/green", "green"), IMAGE("/resource/orange", "orange") ))
CustomField.label: Responded_Icon
